column5: Hi All, I just wanted to take a moment and wish you all a very safe and Merry Christmas.  Regards, Dave Mercer www.factsoffishing.com
Merry Christmas Dave.  Enjoy this year with the little one. Best of luck in the New year with those exciting projects.
Merry fishmas to you too Dave!!
Merry Christmas to you too. Keep up the good work.  007
Merry Christmas Dave.  Can't wait til Christmas day.  I've got my vcr ready to roll  Have a great one.  Joey
Thanks Dave....you have no idea who I am probably, but Merry Christmas to you too!!! haha.
Merry Christmas Dave and have a good New Year, Check your PM
Right back @ ya dave & all the best to you and your family for 2007.
all the best for the holiday season dave darcy
Same right back at ya bud. All the best to you and yours' in 2007 Dave.
Merry Christmas and a Happy New Year, Dave.  All the best in the New Year.  Tom

Merry Christmas to you Doug.  Sorry I couldn't help myself that promo makes me laugh everytime I see it. Hope you have a great holiday season Dave and I'll be watching tomorrow for you big day and visit with Joey.  Mike
Merry fishmas to you too Dave
